answers.answer: Is it possible that your dates were wrong. I know that the u/s done early in pregnancy are said to be the most accurate. As far as beibng induced it is going to be up to your doctor, do you have gestational diabetes? You may just be having a big baby but being 27 weeks and measuring 39 is a big difference. When you sy 39 weeks is that what your stomach is measuring or what the baby is measuring?
since the question was reposted it would be good to change this thread to and open forum to make sure all can be heard today?

question: I want to know am I going induced if my babe at 27 wks but measured at 39 wks? and what is the induced process?
title: Am I going induced if my babe at 27 wks but measured at 39 wks?
